Prerequisite(s): Two Riven Hourglass maneuvers
Range: 30 ft.
Target: None
Duration: Instantaneous (see text)

Description

Area: 30-ft. cone You reach deep within your soul and pull forth a handful of quintessence to cast at your foes, wreaking havoc upon their ability to act. When you initiate this maneuver, you create a 30-foot cone of quintessence. Creatures caught within the cone must succeed at a Will save (DC 16 + your initiation modifier) or become nauseated and affected as if by a slow spell for a number of rounds equal to your initiation modifier. Creatures that succeed on their save are instead affected as if by a slow spell for one round.
